text:
That sounds really exciting, I hope everything goes well. :)

Yes I'm doing okay. I hope you are too

I just found out that all of my subjects are going to do external AS exams and from those results we will get our predicted grades for our A-level exams and also use those for when applying for university so that's something I have to prepare for.

Is it better to do an apprenticeship rather than an internship?
I also didn't know there was a national mentoring day either :joy:
